title: Smartmatic Sues Newsmax and OANN for Defamation
sub_head: Voting-machine company alleges the networks aired defamatory reports related to the 2020 presidential election; the networks have defended their coverage
body:
Voting-machine company Smartmatic USA Corp. sued Newsmax Media Inc. and One America News Network over what it alleges were defamatory reports about the company’s technology following the 2020 presidential election.
Smartmatic filed separate lawsuits against Newsmax and Herring Networks Inc.’s One America News Network, both conservative media networks.
